dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. Jansen
M.-A. Côté
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: ScienceWorld is a textual environment with rich abstract and combinatorial physics, allowing for complex goals such as freezing or boiling water, which requires getting water first, thus defining an optional dependency amongst goals.
dcterms:title: ScienceWorld

dcterms:creator: M.-A. Côté
A. Kádár
X. Yuan

T. Barnes
E. Fine
J. Moore
M. Hausknecht
L. El Asri
M. Adada
dcterms:description: TextWorld is a learning environment designed for text-based games, providing a framework for developing and evaluating agents capable of interacting with textual environments.
dcterms:title: TextWorld
